body.p:
ETown June 13 1861
George W Johnson Esq
Dr Sir

I rece'd yours requesting me to send you 3 bills accepted by my self in your favour, to pay a part of a debt due you by Thomas & Churchill I know of no way that I could pay the bills when thay would fall due, every dollar that I can get shall be applied to pay the debt of T & C dueyou you,
